## Function to wait for a specified number of seconds {.unnumbered} ### Description This function pauses the execution for a specified number of seconds. ### Usage 
wait(n_secs)
### Arguments
n_secs Number of seconds to wait
### Examples ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} library(example) wait(5) # Waits for 5 seconds ``` :::
